channel.title: Archives on Solidforest
channel.description: Recent content in Archives on Solidforest

item.title: Document Formating
item.description: Showcase of sample document and content formating using various available method, heading (6 styles), blockquote, images, embeded media (youtube, vimeo, etc). Element code and many more. This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a theme.

item.title: WhatsApp Multi Linked Devices
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">The features of the previously popular WhatsApp communication application WhatsApp Web are very popular and help them carry out their daily activities, especially for those who are lazy ðŸ˜„ use email to communicate. Yep, with the web version of WhatsApp, it makes it easy for users to share documents, photos and other media spontaneously, while still being able to communicate via chat, voice or video calls. However, while using WhatsApp Web, your device must remain connected to the internet, meaning that if your mobile data quota runs out or your device is offline, the WhatsApp Web service will immediately stop.

item.title: Umbrella an Animated Short Film
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1"></p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">Inspired by true events and filled with messages of empathy and hope, Umbrella follows Joseph’s story, a boy who lives in an orphanage and dreams of having a yellow Umbrella.

item.title: Perfect Combo: Green Energy, Green Technology and Green Business
item.description:
Funding Support for Building Green Energy

</p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">SIFT is dedicated to advancing the sustainability and value of energy. Since 1999, Sustainable Energy Fund has worked tirelessly to build a sustainable energy future. Our mission is to promote, research and invest in clean and renewable energy technologies, energy conservation, energy efficiency and sustainable energy enterprises that provide opportunities and benefits. About us: SIFT is dedicated to advancing the sustainability and value of energy. Since 1999, Sustainable Energy Fund has worked tirelessly to build a sustainable energy future.

item.title: Affordable and Much Greener Furniture
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">We believe that wood is the best form of material for building furniture and we aim to help you make this furniture sustainably. We want to build sustainable and beautiful furniture. We believe in the value of wood, in the power of wood and in the beauty of wood. We are a small family-owned business. We want to build sustainable and beautiful furniture. We want to help you build sustainable and beautiful furniture.

item.title: Approaches to History
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">Professional and amateur historians discover, collect, organize, and present information about past events. They discover this information through archaeological evidence, written primary sources, verbal stories or oral histories, and other archival material. In lists of historians, historians can be grouped by order of the historical period in which they were writing, which is not necessarily the same as the period in which they specialized. Chroniclers and annalists, though they are not historians in the true sense, are also frequently included.

item.title: Improving Access to Education in impoverished areas and developing countries
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">Technology plays an increasingly significant role in improving access to education for people living in impoverished areas and developing countries. However, lack of technological advancement is still causing barriers with regards to quality and access to education in developing countries. Charities like One Laptop per Child are dedicated to providing infrastructures through which the disadvantaged may access educational materials.

item.title: Did you really know what is lorem ipsum?
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">What is Lorem Ipsum? Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry’s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

item.title: Education Type
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">University education includes teaching, research, and social services activities, and it includes both the undergraduate level (sometimes referred to as tertiary education) and the graduate (or postgraduate) level (sometimes referred to as graduate school). Some universities are composed of several colleges.

item.title: How to Decode Binary Numbers
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">Binary is the language of computers. They allow computers to do all of the complex things that they do. You might think that since binary numbers allow for such complex operations that they would be equally complex to decode, but thankfully this is not the case. We will show you how to decode binary numbers into alphabetical or numerical characters. Binary systems predating Leibniz also existed in the ancient world. The aforementioned I Ching that Leibniz encountered dates from the 9th century BC in China. The residents of the island of Mangareva in French Polynesia were using a hybrid binary-decimal system before 1450.

item.title: Venusian on Solar System
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">Venusian surface was a subject of speculation until some of its secrets were revealed by planetary science in the 20th century. Venera landers in 1975 and 1982 returned images of a surface covered in sediment and relatively angular rocks.

item.title: A Quick View on Internazionalization of Education
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">University education includes teaching, research, and social services activities, and it includes both the undergraduate level (sometimes referred to as tertiary education) and the graduate (or postgraduate) level (sometimes referred to as graduate school). Some universities are composed of several colleges. One type of university education is a liberal arts education, which can be defined as a “college or university curriculum aimed at imparting broad general knowledge and developing general intellectual capacities, in contrast to a professional, vocational, or technical curriculum.

item.title: Music is Healing
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">My music has been heavily influenced by bands such as “The Likes of Skream”, “Dirty Heads”, “The Knife”, “M83”, “Tool”, “Black Keys”, “Datsik”, “Pete Tong”, “Jethro Tull”, “The Cure”, and many more.

item.title: A Short and Wide View on History
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">In regard to nature, events apparently the most irregular and capricious have been explained and have been shown to be in accordance with certain fixed and universal laws. This have been done because men of ability and, above all, men of patient, untiring thought have studied events with the view of discovering their regularity, and if human events were subject to a similar treatment, we have every right to expect similar results.

item.title: A Quick View on Internazionalization of Education
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">The shape, methodologies, taught material a.k.a the curriculum of formal education is decided by political decision makers along with federal agencies such as the state education agency in the United States.

item.title: Basic Zoom for Beginners
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">What you should learn on basic as Zoom newbie? You will find the information online easily type the keywords “how to use zoom” using search engine as well as the official Zoom FAQ and documentation itself. Learning focus are key basics on creating, accessing, and using your Zoom account practical, specific instructions on using Zoom on both Mac and PC Easy-to-follow steps to join and create meetings Interactive instructions on testing audio, video, and using Zoomâ€™s chat function How to avoid the most common mistakes people make using Zoom Advanced skills with virtual backgrounds, adding icon-based reactions to meetings, and different ways to view meeting members All the skills you need to feel effective and comfortable on Zoom, whether during work or social calls.

item.title: The Sustainable Farm Project
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">There was a common misconception that farming methods have changed much since we first started using them. The truth is, just because there are more types of crops on the market doesn’t mean they have not changed in some form or another over time!

item.title: What is History
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">History also includes the academic discipline which uses narrative to describe, examine, question, and analyze past events, and investigate their patterns of cause and effect. All history is contemporary history â€” Benedetto Croce Historians write in the context of their own time, and with due regard to the current dominant ideas of how to interpret the past, and sometimes write to provide lessons for their own society. In the words of Benedetto Croce, “All history is contemporary history”.

item.title: Thought About Music and Musicians
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">Sarah, who had to give up her dream of becoming a professional musician to live her dream of being an independent musician, has been dreaming of this dream for a long time, it all started when she was little, and she always wanted to play music but she always thought she couldn’t do it. She started to learn how to play instruments at the age of 7, and then she started to make music. After a while she found her passion in the field of music, but she couldn’t believe in herself. So, she decided to try and make her dreams come true.
